long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Treasure - Search & Earn Rewards

Discover the magic of Tab Treasure, the ultimate browser extension that transforms your new tab into a rewards hub. With every search you make, you get closer to redeeming vouchers and Amazon gift cards. It’s a seamless way to turn your everyday browsing into an opportunity for exciting rewards.

Why Choose Tab Treasure?

Rewarding Searches
Imagine doing what you already do every day—searching the web—but now, every search brings you closer to valuable rewards. The more you search, the quicker you can redeem rewards like Amazon gift cards and vouchers. Track your progress on the treasure map, see your locked and unlocked gift cards, and claim them anytime after reaching milestones. Plus, complete daily quests to earn extra points and reach milestones even faster. It’s that simple.

Productivity Boosters
📝 Quick Notes
📎 Efficient Bookmarks Manager

Enhanced Browsing Experience
📜 Comprehensive History Manager
🌄 Customisable Wallpapers
☀️ Up-to-Date Weather Info
🕒 Convenient Clock Display

How It Works
1. Install Tab Treasure: Add the extension to your browser in seconds.
2. Start Searching: Use your new tab to search the web as you normally would.
3. Earn Rewards: Based on the number of searches you perform, you’ll earn rewards.
4. Redeem Rewards: Track your progress on the treasure map and exchange your accumulated searches for Amazon gift cards and vouchers. Claim your rewards anytime after reaching milestones.

Transform Your Browsing Today! With Tab Treasure, every search is a step closer to exciting rewards. Make the most of your browsing time and enjoy a host of features designed to enhance your productivity and personalise your experience.

Disclaimer:
By using this extension, you consent to the inclusion of affiliate links. These links help support the development and maintenance of the extension. Search results are powered by Yahoo.
